mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ctdetail WHERE ctdetail.DetailRecordID = #{recordID } ORDER BY DetailWndID, DetailDishDateFlag ASC
SELECT * FROM ctdetail,ctrecord WHERE ctdetail.DetailRecordID = ctrecord.RecordID and ctrecord.RecordID = #{recordID } ORDER BY DetailWndID
